docs.title: 欢迎​来到​「​岩溶​尘​的​空间​」
docs.text:
​这里​记录​我​的​学习​笔记​与​生活​日常​。

# ​这是​普通​代码​片段​示例​（​仅​展示​，​不​执行​）
print("Hello, MkDocs!")

docs.title: Python ​示例
docs.text:
In [1]: Copied! 
import matplotlib as mpl
mpl.rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif'
mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC', 'WenQuanYi Zen Hei', 'DejaVu Sans']
mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False

sum(i*i for i in range(1, 11))
import matplotlib as mpl mpl.rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif' mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC', 'WenQuanYi Zen Hei', 'DejaVu Sans'] mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False sum(i*i for i in range(1, 11)) Out[1]: 
385

​再来一个​带​输出​的​循环​：

In [2]: Copied! 
for i in range(1,6):
    print(i, i*i)
for i in range(1,6): print(i, i*i) 
1 1
2 4
3 9
4 16
5 25

docs.title: Python ​示例​¶
docs.text: ​下面​的​单元​会​在​构建​网站​时​自动​执行​：

docs.title: 实验​ 001 · ​正弦曲线​与​统计​直方图
docs.text:
In [1]: Copied! 
import matplotlib as mpl
mpl.rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif'
mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC', 'WenQuanYi Zen Hei', 'DejaVu Sans']
mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False
import matplotlib as mpl
mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC']
mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False
import matplotlib as mpl mpl.rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif' mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC', 'WenQuanYi Zen Hei', 'DejaVu Sans'] mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False import matplotlib as mpl mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Noto Sans CJK SC'] mpl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False In [2]: Copied! 
import numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 400)
y = np.sin(x)
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('sin(x)')
plt.xlabel('x'); plt.ylabel('sin x')
plt.show()
import numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 400) y = np.sin(x) plt.plot(x, y) plt.title('sin(x)') plt.xlabel('x'); plt.ylabel('sin x') plt.show()

import numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt
data = np.random.normal(loc=0, scale=1, size=1000)
plt.hist(data, bins=30)
plt.title('N(0,1) ​直方图​')
plt.show()
import numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt data = np.random.normal(loc=0, scale=1, size=1000) plt.hist(data, bins=30) plt.title('N(0,1) ​直方图​') plt.show()
